0.3.name: wordpress/filmtied
0.3.description: Filmtied plugin replaces all IMDB links with Filmtied.com links. This plugin is to help Filmtied Affiliate Partners to make earning on the affiliate program better and faster. It may either replace IMDB or leave it and put Filmtied links next to it. It is the part of Filmtied Affiliate Program in which users earn on every click to any Filmtied link.
